title: Boosted Account Found - [NAME REMOVED] (OCE)
body:
Hey guys, I don't know if boosting is illegal in League, but nevertheless i found an account in Oceania that was boosted all the way from Bronze to Diamond 5 in Season 7. 

Here is a Link to his OP.GG Profile;
[LINK REMOVED]

He is D5 in SoloQ with a 58% winrate, but his flex stats definitely do not reflect that skill level (The Booster only played on his soloq rank I guess)
The booster was a Jungle main who basically used Rek'Sai OTP to get from Bronze to diamond, he was on my friends list for a while and I told him its too good to be true for a player to suddenly get good so much to go to diamond after being in Bronze for 4 seasons in a row. If you see his current stats, he no longer plays Jungle or any of the champs the Booster used. 

If you do see him in any of your games do not overestimate him, he may have the Diamond border and icon but his skills are High Bronze at the most.

Haha, im Salty to...
